titleStmt.title: SII 13.224: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 224. (A.R. No. 572 of 1920.) UḌAYĀRGUḌI (NEAR KĀṬṬUMANNĀRKŌYIL), CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, ANANTĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is probably an inscription of Parāntaka II Sundara-Chōḷa. It records a gift of some lands for providing for the sacred bath with a thousand potfuls of water, of god Tiruvanantīśvarattu-Paramasvāmi at Vīranārāyaṇa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam on the day of Saṅkrānti every month, by Vīmaṉ Kundavaiyār the mother of Ariñjiya Pirāntakadēvar, by which is evidently meant Parāntaka, son of Ariñjaya. Kundavaiyār is surmised to have been a daughter of Ādittaṉ Vīmaṉ, the chief of Aṇḍurai and the donor of two grants in the reign of Ariñjaya (M.E.R. 1928, II, 3). Among the boundaries of the gift-lands is mentioned a channel called Irumuḍichchōḻavāykkāl and another called Mānavalla[bha*]-vāykkāl. Irumuḍi-Chōḷa was a surname of Parāntaka I (S.I.I. Vol. III, Int. p. 13).

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
kovirācakecaripaṉmarkku yāṇṭu paṉṉiraṇṭāvatu śrīviraṉārāyaṇacaturvvedimaṅkalattu tiru
vaṉan=tiśvarattu paramasvāmikku tiṅkaṭoṟum saṅkirān=tikku sahasra kalacam cantrādicca
val snapaṉamāṭṭuvataṟku śrī Aṟiñciya pirāntakatevar taṅkaḷ Ācciyā ruṭaiyapirāṭṭiyār vimaṉ
kuntavaiyār koṇṭu kuṭutta pūmi māṉakulācanicceri Uṟuppuṭṭūrt tiruvikkiramakirama vitta
ṉiṭai Ivvūr vaṭapiṭākai cantiracekaravatikkuk kiḻakku māṉavallavāykkālukku vaṭakku Iraṇ
ṭāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu mutaṟcatirattu melai Aṟumāvil Ivaṉiṭai koṇṭa mukkāṇi Eḻum ....
kaṟppakaraccerik kārampicceṭṭu nāppottu cannaiyakkiramavittaṉiṭai vilaikoṇṭu Uṭaiya
Ivvaṟumāviley mukkāṇiyum .... Ivvatikkuk kiḻakku Irumuṭiccoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku muta
ṟkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāñcatirattu melai Aṟumāvil Uṟuppaṭṭur tiruvikkiramakiramavi
ttaṉiṭai vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya teṟkuniṉṟum muṉṟu mukkāṇiyum .... Ippiṭākaiyi
ley viranārāyaṇavatikku kiḻakku cantiracekaravāykkālukku vaṭakku mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu
Iraṇṭāñ catirattu kaṟpakacaracceri poṟpuṟattu tattayakiramavittaṉiṭai vilaikoṇṭa
pūmi mukkāṇiyum .... Ivvūrk kiḻpiṭākai kotaṇṭarāmavatikku meṟku kaṇavativāykkālu
kku teṟku Oṉpatāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñcatirattu kaṟpakaracceri poṟpuṟattu tiṇ
ṭikumārakiramavittaṉiṭai vilaikoṇṭa pūmi mākāṇiyum .... Ivaṉiṭaiye Āraikuṭi nattattu
vilaikoṇṭa nattakkuḻi nālum .
Digital edition of SII 13.224 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
